name: Budget Bot Simulator 50k
description:
mWZ-50 is a budget bot.

Sure it can't do nearly as many tasks as its full priced brethren, but it can still do plenty, like jump! And duck! And explode!
However, after 50 commands, the bot will shut down.

Can you make it through these challenges without running out of controls (haha get it bc its the game jam theme lol)

Made for the GMTK Jam 2020

This is my first proper game I've ever released, shoutouts to GMTK for motivating me to actually release a game for once.

music by https://twitter.com/thegooseisloos6
